description: This week, we learned … … the effects of a single terrorist nuclear bomb. Read of the week. Where have nuclear bombs been deployed by the U.S.?     … Nestle makes billions bottling water it pays nearly nothing for. Where is freshwater available around the world?     … the purpose of education—according to…
